description: To ruin her reputation and divorce her without giving her a penny, her cheating husband got her drunk and left her in a hotel room with a strange man. Under the effects of alcohol, she had a one-night stand with the rich businessman Long Sihao, who was the most eligible bachelor and the man in every woman’s dreams in the city.
